auth.twoFactorTitle: Please enter the authentication code from your authenticator app.
auth.twoFactorNote: Note: if you don't have access to your authenticator device, you can reset your 2FA with a recovery code by logging in via the website.
auth.enterPinToUnlock: Enter your PIN to unlock your vault
auth.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
auth.unlockSuccessDescription: You can now use autofill in login forms in your browser.
auth.scanQrCode: Scan this QR code with your AliasVault mobile app to log in and unlock your vault.

errors.invalidCode: Please enter a valid 6-digit authentication code.
errors.serverError: Could not reach AliasVault server. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
errors.accountLocked: Account temporarily locked due to too many failed attempts.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
errors.mobileLoginRequestExpired: Mobile login request timed out. Please reload the page and try again.

errors.serverNotAvailable: The AliasVault server is not available. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
errors.clientVersionNotSupported: This version of the AliasVault browser extension is not supported by the server anymore. Please update your browser extension to the latest version.
errors.browserExtensionOutdated: This browser extension is outdated and cannot be used to access this vault. Please update this browser extension to continue.
errors.serverVersionNotSupported: The AliasVault server needs to be updated to a newer version in order to use this browser extension. Please contact support if you need help.
errors.serverVersionTooOld: The AliasVault server needs to be updated to a newer version in order to use this feature. Please contact the server admin if you need help.
errors.unknownErrorTryAgain: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.passwordChanged: Your password has changed since the last time you logged in. Please login again for security reasons.
errors.syncConflictMaxRetries: Could not sync vault after multiple attempts. Please try again later.
errors.mergeFailed: Failed to merge vault changes. Please try again.
errors.legacyMergeRequired: Vault merge required. Please login via the web app to merge the pending updates to your vault.

apiErrors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
apiErrors.ACCOUNT_LOCKED: Account temporarily locked due to too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
apiErrors.ACCOUNT_BLOCKED: Your account has been disabled. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact support.
apiErrors.USER_NOT_FOUND: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
apiErrors.INVALID_AUTHENTICATOR_CODE: Invalid authenticator code. Please try again.
apiErrors.INVALID_RECOVERY_CODE: Invalid recovery code. Please try again.
apiErrors.PUBLIC_REGISTRATION_DISABLED: New account registration is currently disabled on this server. Please contact the administrator.
apiErrors.USERNAME_MISMATCH: Username does not match the current user.
apiErrors.PASSWORD_MISMATCH: The provided password does not match your current password.
apiErrors.USERNAME_EMPTY_OR_WHITESPACE: Username cannot be empty or whitespace.
apiErrors.USERNAME_TOO_SHORT: Username too short: must be at least 3 characters long.
apiErrors.USERNAME_TOO_LONG: Username too long: cannot be longer than 40 characters.
apiErrors.USERNAME_INVALID_CHARACTERS: Username is invalid, can only contain letters or digits.
apiErrors.VAULT_NOT_UP_TO_DATE: Your vault is not up-to-date. Please synchronize your vault and try again.
apiErrors.VAULT_ERROR: The local vault is not up-to-date. Please synchronize your vault by refreshing the page and try again.

content.randomIdentityDescription: Generate a random identity with a random email address accessible in AliasVault.
content.manualCredentialDescription: Specify your own email address and username.
content.failedToCreateIdentity: Failed to create identity. Please try again.

credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.welcomeDescription: To use the AliasVault browser extension: navigate to a website and use the AliasVault autofill popup to create a new credential.
credentials.noPasskeysFound: No passkeys have been created yet. Passkeys are created by visiting a website that offers passkeys as an authentication method.
credentials.deleteItemConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.

validation.invalidDateFormat: Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format

credentials.publicEmailDescription: Anonymous but limited privacy. Email content is readable by anyone that knows the address.

items.title: Items
items.folderSaveError: Failed to save folder. Please try again.
items.welcomeDescription: To use the AliasVault browser extension: navigate to a website and use the AliasVault autofill popup to create a new credential.
items.noPasskeysFound: No passkeys have been created yet. Passkeys are created by visiting a website that offers passkeys as an authentication method.
items.emptyFolderHint: To move items to this folder, edit the item and tap the folder icon in the name field.
items.deleteFolderConfirm: How would you like to delete "{{folderName}}"?
items.deleteFolderKeepItemsDescription: Items will be moved back to the main list.
items.deleteFolderAndItemsDescription: {{count}} item(s) will be moved to Recently Deleted.

itemTypes.selectTypeDescription: Choose the type of item you want to create

alias.title: Alias
alias.description: Login with auto-generated email alias and identity

creditCard.title: Credit Card
creditCard.description: Credit card information and payment details

totp.instructions: Enter the secret key shown by the website where you want to add two-factor authentication.

emails.title: Emails
emails.deleteEmailConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this email?
emails.noEmailsDescription: You have not received any emails at your private email addresses yet. When you receive a new email, it will appear here.

errors.emailLoadError: An error occurred while loading emails. Please try again later.
errors.emailUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while loading emails. Please try again later.

apiErrors.CLAIM_DOES_NOT_MATCH_USER: The current chosen email address is already in use. Please change the email address by editing this credential.
apiErrors.CLAIM_DOES_NOT_EXIST: An error occurred while trying to load the emails. Please try to edit and save the credential entry to synchronize the database, then try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.activeOnAllSites: Active on all sites (unless disabled below)
settings.autofillMatchingModeDescription: Determines which credentials are considered a match and shown as suggestions in the autofill popup for a given website.
settings.clipboardClearTimeoutDescription: Automatically clear the clipboard after copying sensitive data
settings.autoLockTimeoutDescription: Automatically lock the vault after a period of inactivity
settings.autoLockTimeoutHelp: The vault will only lock after the specified period of inactivity (no autofill usage or extension popup opened). The vault will always lock when the browser is closed, regardless of this setting.
settings.contextMenuDescription: Right-click on input fields to access AliasVault options
settings.serverConfigurationDescription: Configure the AliasVault server URL for self-hosted instances
settings.apiUrlHint: The API endpoint URL (usually client URL + /api)
settings.clientUrlHint: The web interface URL of your self-hosted instance
settings.autofillSettingsDescription: Enable or disable the autofill popup on web pages
settings.autofillEnabledDescription: Autofill suggestions will appear on login forms

validation.apiUrlInvalid: Please enter a valid API URL
validation.clientUrlInvalid: Please enter a valid client URL

unlockMethod.title: Vault Unlock Method
unlockMethod.introText: Choose how you want to unlock your vault. You can use your master password (always available) or set up a PIN code for faster access. After 3 failed PIN attempts, you'll need to use your master password.
unlockMethod.enterNewPinDescription: Enter a PIN code consisting of minimum 6 digits
unlockMethod.confirmPinDescription: Enter your PIN again to confirm
unlockMethod.pinLocked: PIN unlock has been disabled. Please use your master password to unlock your vault.
unlockMethod.pinSecurityWarning: PIN unlock in the browser extension can be less secure than your master password, as PINs typically have lower entropy and may be brute-forced if your device is compromised. Use it only on devices you fully trust.

passkeys.helpText: Passkeys are created on the website when prompted. They cannot be manually edited. To remove this passkey, you can delete it from this credential. To replace this passkey or create a new one, visit the website and follow its prompts.
passkeys.passkeyWillBeDeleted: This passkey will be deleted when you save this credential.

bypass.title: Use Browser Passkey
bypass.description: How long would you like to use the browser's passkey provider for {{origin}}?

authenticate.title: Sign in with Passkey
authenticate.selectPasskey: Select a passkey to sign in:
authenticate.noPasskeysFound: No passkeys found for this site

create.title: Create Passkey
create.titlePlaceholder: Enter a name for this passkey
create.selectExistingLoginDescription: Attach this passkey to an existing login credential for this site.

recentlyDeleted.title: Recently Deleted
recentlyDeleted.noItemsDescription: Items you delete will appear here for 30 days before being permanently removed.
recentlyDeleted.description: These items will be permanently deleted after 30 days. You can restore them or delete them immediately.
recentlyDeleted.confirmDeleteMessage: This item will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
recentlyDeleted.confirmEmptyAllMessage: All {{count}} items will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.

upgrade.title: Upgrade Vault
upgrade.subtitle: AliasVault has updated and your vault needs to be upgraded. This should only take a few seconds.
upgrade.whatsNewDescription: An upgrade is required to support the following changes:
upgrade.noDescriptionAvailable: No description available for this version.

alerts.unableToGetVersionInfo: Unable to get version information. Please try again.
alerts.selfHostedWarning: If you're using a self-hosted server, make sure to also update your self-hosted instance as otherwise logging in to the web client will stop working.
